name: Candy Jump 2 - The Old Age
description:
Are you ready to have some fun?

Candy Jump 2 is an improved gameplay version of the iOS version Candy Jump 1 - The New Age. Here you'll encounter more enemies, funny characters and exiting specials to create a real jumping adventure.

The platforms now are physics-based. The game is more challenging than ever. All game characters are in-game currency managed.

Just like Doodle Jump and other jumping games out there, it's INSANELY addictive. It's great to play in your spare time or unload the mental burdens we all get on a daily basis.

Play now, it's FREE!
